title: Question about ocean week and the 6th battle for the icon
body:
Hello,

I did participate in the 5th battle and got all the points I need to qualify for the icon, but since we did not win the 5th battle do I still get the icon eve if I did not participate in the 6th monster defeat?

I would have participated, but I work a graveyard shift so I'm sleeping all day and working all night and I don't have any to none time to play.

replies.body:
We won the 4th battle, it's the 5th battle we lost.

And no, you don't need to have participated in the 6th battle to receive the icon, all you need is 6 points before the icon was unlocked (which you say you managed).
Thanks for the info, and I did meant to put the 5th battle, this phone keyboard had tiny keys.
